type.description: Chip type, can be set to default primary info success warning danger
type.description_zh: Chip type, can be set to default primary info success warning danger

size.description: Chip size, can be set to normal mini small large
size.description_zh: Chip size, can be set to normal mini small large

icon-name.description: Custom closeable icon must be used when Closeable is true
icon-name.description_zh: Custom closeable icon must be used when Closeable is true

text-color.description: The text color takes precedence over the color attribute
text-color.description_zh: The text color takes precedence over the color attribute

events.name: close
events.description: Triggered when the Close button is clicked and can only be used when the Close button is displayed
events.description_zh: Triggered when the Close button is clicked and can only be used when the Close button is displayed

slots.name: left
slots.description: The content inserted to the left of the chip
slots.description_zh: The content inserted to the left of the chip

slots.name: right
slots.description: The content inserted to the right of the label
slots.description_zh: The content inserted to the right of the label
